articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspects International Friendship Exhibition
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspects International Friendship Exhibition
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected the enlarged International Friendship Exhibition.
   He went round halls of the exhibition and learned about how gifts were displayed and preserved. He then expressed great satisfaction at the well-furnished exhibition.
   He said every gift on display reflected the world people's deep respect and reverence for President Kim Il Sung.
   He also said President Kim Il Sung, acclaimed by the Korean people for the first time in their history spanning thousands of years, was a peerlessly great man venerated by the whole world and that his sun-like image would always remain in the memory of humankind.
   Pointing out that the exhibition was the most valuable treasure of the nation which the Korean people should convey down through generations, he outlined tasks for the preservation of gifts and management of the exhibition.

articles.title: National performance of schoolchildren art circles
articles.content:
National performance of schoolchildren art circles
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- A national performance of schoolchildren art circles was given at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace on Monday to mark the 45th anniversary of writing  a "Letter of Blessing" to President Kim Il Sung by  General Kim Jong Il.
   Vice-President Pak Song Chol and officials concerned saw the performance.
   It began with the chorus of the famous "Song of Blessing" which was written by Kim Jong Il, followed by a group singing "Two Pine-Nut Trees," a solo "Floral Bouquet," a dance "Flower Blooming with Our Mind," a chorus "Letter of Blessing from Three Million schoolchildren" and other colorful numbers.
   The performers powerfully represented the determination of the Korean schoolchildren to follow the glorious youth and childhood of Kim Jong Il to  reliably carry forward the Juche revolutionary cause and prepare themselves as true loyal subjects and filial sons and daughters who devote their all to his safety and long life in good health.
   Meanwhile, camping evenings "Song of Blessing" were held at children's camps across the country.

articles.title: Friendship gathering on Int'l Children's Day
articles.content:
Friendship gathering on Int'l Children's Day
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- A friendship gathering of Korean and foreign women and children here was held at Mangyongdae Fun Fair on Monday to mark the 48th anniversary of the International Children's Day (June 1).
   Present at the gathering were Secretary Kim Jung Rin of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee and vice-Premier Kim Pok Sin and others.
   Wives of foreign diplomatic envoys in Korea and foreign women and children were invited to the gathering.
   The participants deepened feelings of friendship, playing  an amusement game "Let us go to native home," a basketball game, toy-plucking, tug-of-war,  running with guests,  forming a train for national reunification, letter-fitting and other sports and amusement games.
   They enjoyed themselves with fun fairs.

articles.title: Three-day demonstration of "Hanchongryon" students
articles.content:
Three-day demonstration of "Hanchongryon" students
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Students of the South Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) waged a demonstration by subway for three consecutive days from May 29,  a Seoul-based radio said.
   On May 31, upwards of 1,500 students called for renegotiations with the international monetary fund and big business reform, taking the travel around Seoul by subway.
   Upset by this, the fascist police blocked the subway stations and kept the demonstration from spreading to the streets, walking off to the police some 560  who particiapted in the inaugural meeting of the sixth-term Hanchongryon and demonstration. And they applied for a warrant of arrest against 47 students who were suspected of "leading the demonstration".

articles.title: U.S. aggressors hit for their outrage
articles.content:
U.S. aggressors hit for their outrage
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. aggressors committed violence against the residents in Misan-subcounty, Ryonchon county, Kyonggi Province of South Korea who were holding a strong protest against the war exercises of the U.S. Forces and inflicted a severe injury upon them on May 30.
   Rodong Sinmun today says that the outrage can be committed only by the U.S. Imperialist aggressors, descendants of the pirates notorious for man-hunting.
   The news analyst says:
   It must not go unnoticed that such outrage still continues under the present "government" of South Korea.
   The present puppet rulers of South Korea are begging for the permanent presence of the u.s. Forces in South Korea more zealously than their predecessors did.  They claim that even after the reunification of the country the U.S. Forces should be kept in South Korea.
   With the aggressors left in the country the South Koreans cannot extricate themselves from misfortune any time. Nor can they live in peace.
    The South Korean people, therefore, call for the U.S. troop pullout more earnestly with each passing day. Their call manifests their unanimous will to drive the U.S. imperialist aggression forces out of South Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on basic characteristics of WPK's activities
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on basic characteristics of WPK's activities 
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today runs a signed article entitled "it is basic characteristics of WPK's activities to attach great importance to country and nation."
   The author of the article says:
   The idea of attaching great importance to the nation is the starting-point of the lines and policies of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and a basic cornerstone of all its activities.
  Above all, the WPK has solved all problems of the revolution and construction in the Korean way in the interests of the country and nation.
   It has always worked out lines and policies in keeping with the specific condition of Korea and with the basic interests of the Korean nation. And it has carried out socialist construction in the Korean way with the Juche-based stand, not depending upon any established formula or other's experience.
   It has also thoroughly applied the excellent national character of the Korean people to all domains of the revolution and construction while effectively preserving it.
   It set forth a unique idea that the superiority of the nation is precisely the greatness of the leader and implanted into the of people minds the unshakable faith that, guided by a great leader, the Korean nation is the best.
   It has resolutely fought to attain the unity of the entire nation.
   Whenever grave obstacles cropped up in the way of the revolution owing to the moves of outside forces and reactionaries to keep the nation divided, the WPK put forward lines of great national unity. These lines have always enjoyed absolute support of all the people and the guidance of the WPK for national reunification served as a powerful motive force which inspires the fellow countrymen with strength and courage and rouses them to implement the cause of reunification.
   All the fellow countrymen in the north, south and abroad, seeing a bright prospect of the nation in the policy of the WPK, are powerfully demonstrating the dignity and resourcefulness of the nation in the struggle for country's reunification and victory of socialism, entrusting all their destinies to the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK to strongly urge Japan to liquidate past crime
articles.content:
DPRK to strongly urge Japan to liquidate past crime
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Since Japan's liquidation of the past crime is directly linked with the question of creating an atmosphere of true good neighbourhood and friendship in Asia, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea will fight it out till it is solved completely.
   The delegate of the DPRK made the remarks on May 26 at the 23rd session of the working group on slave of modern version held in Switzerland.
   He said the DPRK bitterly condemns all sorts of slavery and enslavement which still remain worldwide, and calls for an early liquidation of such acts.
   Japan's "comfort women for the army" issue is not mere sexual harassment of Asian women, but a thrice-cursed crime ever known in history, that is, reducing women to mental and physical cripples, beating, stabbing and strangling them to death, he said, and continued:
   Japan should show her willingness to do away with the past crime in practice.  She admits the criminal facts, but refuses to make them public and tries to distort them.
   The DPRK delegate urged Japan to make public all the data concerning the past crime. He also called for the Japanese government to admit the responsibility for the crime and make an apology and compensation for it.
   The Japanese government should make a due apology and compensation for the great pains and losses the victims and their bereaved families are subjected to for its refusal to do away with the crime, the DPRK delegate said.

articles.title: Efforts made to create new speed
articles.content:
Efforts made to create new speed
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Korea is creating a "New Chollima Speed, the speed of forced march".
   The speed is very instrumental in turning impossibility into  possibility and working miracles in the present difficult situation.
   The new speed began in the construction of major objects in Pyongyang in less than one month after the central committee of the Workers' Party of Korea called for vigorously dashing forward at a New Chollima Speed by following the workers of the Songjin Steel Complex.
   Soldier-builders raised the construction speed of objects 2.5-3 times.
   The soldier-builders in charge of the laying of a new Rimhung crossroad-Sinmidong Road leading to the Pyongyang airport have already built hundreds of reinforced concrete piers, which amounted to what would have taken several months.
   They completed a project in a single night, which would have taken three or four days at an ordinary speed, and finished another project in a matter of two days, which would have taken ten days.
   The builders in charge of the April 25 Hotel and the April 25 Film Studio of the Korean People's Army which are of world standard finished the last 50 percent project of floor assembling in a month.
   That amounted to what was done for the past few months.
   The builders there are gaining dazzling successes in the construction of the interior.
   Three more floors were assembled in the wake of the publication of the WPK Central Committee's calls.
   The plastering is carried out at more than 220 percent compared with the daily average standard.
   Innovations are reported from housing and structural construction, river improvement project and other construction sites of the capital city.
   A drive to create the "New Chollima Speed, the speed of the forced march" which began in the building of the capital city is brisk throughout the country.
   The builders of the capital city assembled a flat for a household  in 14 minutes to create world-shaking "Pyongyang Speed" at the end of the 50s during which the great Chollima Upswing was effected.

articles.title: Way to reunification
articles.content:
Way to reunification
 Pyongyang, June 2 (KCNA) -- Students in the northern half of Korea proposed to their fellow students in the south to hold contacts and meetings between them. These proposals are contained in the letters sent by University Student Committees under the north headquarters of the national alliance of youth and students for the country's reunification (Pomchonghakryon) to general student councils under the South Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) a few days ago.
   Students of Kim Il Sung University proposed to the students of Hanyang University in Seoul to make a joint expedition to historical relics and invited them to Pyongyang.
   The letter of students of Hamhung University of chemical engineering to the students of Keimyung University in Taegu proposed holding a joint seminar on the issue of national reunification, inheriting the spirit of seniors who had burned with patriotism.
   Students of Rajin University of marine transport suggested to the students of Gyungsung university in South Korea to hold a seminar on "on genuine ideal of students in north and south at present" and called for awakening the universities and colleges across the country with the torchlight of independent interchange highly raised at both ends of the territory.
   Students of Dongguk University in Seoul were also invited to "visits to scenic spots in Kangwon Province."
   This proposal was made by the students of Pyongyang University of mechanical engineering. It set the period of stay from July 20 to 30.
   They also asked their fellow students in the south to help them to see the scenic island-stubbed sea and Lake Paekrok. 
   Students of Hamhung University of hydraulic engineering and power proposed to the students of Kyongbuk National University in Taegu to play a joint football game and those of Sariwon University of geology suggested to their fellow students of Ajou University in Suwon to hold a soccer tournament for reunification.
   Kim In Ho, recently-elected chairman of the north headquarters of Pomchonghakryon, expressed the expectation that the proposals of the north students would be accepted at an early date, stressing:
    The students in the north and the south should hold travels and contacts before anyone else. Through this, they should preserve the commonness and superiority of the Korean nation and narrow down margins of differences between the north and the south.
   This is precisely the way to reunification of the country.
